column4: How can I keep my belkin rt2750 driver from 6.10 instead of the rt73usb installed in 7.10? According to dmesg, rt73usb is the default at boot. :-(
you could try blacklisting it if it's a module.
I tried that, using the instructions at https://answers.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+question/5290 but dmesg is still listing it as the driver running the network interface
Thanks for the help last night. Turned out it was the blacklist after all.
